parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name for which you want to disable real-time log delivery. You can specify multiple domain names and separate them with commas (,).

parameters.name: Logstore
parameters.description: The name of the Logstore where log entries are stored.

parameters.name: Project
parameters.description: The name of the Log Service project that is used for real-time log delivery.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Log Service project is deployed.
